author: Geniu$
text: I wanted it all with you but this is chess & you playing checkers.

author: Geniu$
text: If they don’t see it it’s just not meant for them to see.

author: Geniu$
text: I like fast cars & pretty woman that most don’t have a chance with. I don’t think that will ever change.

author: Geniu$
text: It’s all love even if we never speak again I’m headed down a different path, we’re going opposite ways.

author: Geniu$
text: I knew I was a legend before anyone said I was.
